sn35.28:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava gayayam viharati gayasise saddhim bhikkhusahassena.
sn35.28:1.5: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, adittam, rupa aditta, cakkhuvinnanam adittam, cakkhusamphasso aditto. Yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi adittam.
sn35.28:1.7: ‘Ragaggina, dosaggina, mohaggina adittam, jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi adittan’ti vadami …pe…
sn35.28:1.8: jivha aditta, rasa aditta, jivhavinnanam adittam, jivhasamphasso aditto. Yampidam jivhasamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi adittam.
sn35.28:1.10: ‘Ragaggina, dosaggina, mohaggina adittam, jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi adittan’ti vadami …pe…
sn35.28:1.11: mano aditto, dhamma aditta, manovinnanam adittam, manosamphasso aditto. Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi adittam.
sn35.28:1.13: ‘Ragaggina, dosaggina, mohaggina adittam, jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi adittan’ti vadami.
sn35.28:1.14: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati, yampidam cakkhusamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.28:1.15: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.28:1.16: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.28:1.17: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
sn35.28:2.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandum.
sn35.28:2.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane tassa bhikkhusahassassa anupadaya asavehi cittani vimuccimsuti.
